input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='WELLFOR 6-Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights | TX-HGY-10018US'
  - Name='Santa's Workshop 6' Pencil Slim Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Duxbury Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 4ft. Winter Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree Pre-Lit with 50 LED Lights and Ornaments in Decorative Planter'
  - Name='Vickerman 12' x 62" Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Pre-Lit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Andover Mills Lighted Artificial Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Homcom 6ft Prelit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 4.5ft. Flocked Manchester Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 100 Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Blue Fir Tree 7.5 ft.'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Artificial Slim Douglas Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 6.5-ft. Pre-lit Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Downswept Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 750 Clear/Multi-Colored LED UL listed Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 9 ft. Colorado Mountain Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 900 Multi LED Lights and 4600 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 9' Flocked West Virginia Fir Christmas Tree with 650 Lights'
  - Name='Homcom 5ft Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches, Multi-Color LED Lights, Fiber Optics and 180 Tips'
  - Name='Puleo International 9 ft. Pre-Lit Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 1000 UL-Listed'
  - Name='Puleo International Balsam Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='WELLFOR Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights CM-HJY'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR 6-Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights | TX-HGY-10018US
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and pre-lit feature, but different brand and unspecified tree silhouette or branch construction; white LEDs vs reference's clear lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santa's Workshop 6' Pencil Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height but slim pencil profile differs significantly from downswept full silhouette; likely different branch types and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel-Real Duxbury Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with Feel-Real technology like reference, but different model (Duxbury) so probably similar in quality and construction though silhouette may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 4ft. Winter Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree Pre-Lit with 50 LED Lights and Ornaments in Decorative Planter
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller size, flocked finish, includes ornaments and planter; less comparable in silhouette and branch technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 12' x 62" Douglas Fir Artificial Slim Pre-Lit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand but same Douglas Fir type and pre-lit. Slim profile contrasts with downswept full body, but similar height (~6.2 ft diameter if interpreting dimensions).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Andover Mills Lighted Artificial Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic fir tree pre-lit product; lacks detail about silhouette or branch technology; likely less specialized than reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Homcom 6ft Prelit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and pre-lit artificial tree but lacks detail on tree type and branch realism; likely less authentic than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 4.5ft. Flocked Manchester Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 100 Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter, flocked spruce not fir, fewer lights, smaller and likely different branch construction; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Blue Fir Tree 7.5 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and similar fir type at larger size; blue fir may differ in color and branch details but likely similar construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir type, artificial and presumably pre-lit; different model but similar features and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, different tree type (spruce vs fir), likely similar quality and construction, probably pre-lit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Artificial Slim Douglas Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Douglas Fir type matches reference but slim silhouette contrasts with downswept full shape; likely lower branch fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6.5-ft. Pre-lit Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Downswept Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar height, pre-lit, downswept Douglas Fir silhouette, just different brand; likely comparable quality and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 750 Clear/Multi-Colored LED UL listed Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size and pre-lit but different fir variety (Fraser Fir); slightly different light color options; good similarity but not identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 9 ft. Colorado Mountain Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 900 Multi LED Lights and 4600 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand, larger size, multi LED lights, but similar fir type and emphasis on natural look and bendable branches align with reference features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 9' Flocked West Virginia Fir Christmas Tree with 650 Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much taller and flocked finish differentiates from reference; fir type and pre-lit with similar number of lights maintain some relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Homcom 5ft Tall Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Realistic Branches, Multi-Color LED Lights, Fiber Optics and 180 Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same fir type and pre-lit with realistic branches but shorter height and more complex lighting features differentiate from simpler reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 9 ft. Pre-Lit Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 1000 UL-Listed
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir type (Balsam), taller, pre-lit with more lights; some similarity in construction but different silhouette and size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International Balsam Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to above but less size specified; same fir type and pre-lit but differs from downswept Douglas Fir reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Narrow silhouette Fraser Fir differs from downswept Douglas Fir; both high quality brands but different constructions and profiles.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights CM-HJY
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic pre-lit artificial tree from different brand, no details on fir type or silhouette, less relevant than more specific fir downswept models.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different tree type (White Spruce) and unique flip feature; similar premium brand but geometric and construction differences from downswept Douglas Fir.
